title: Big Changes Come To Activsion Blizzard - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.28.21
description:
Get 25% off and zero delivery fees on your first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter code GAMES2021!

Download the DraftKings app NOW and use promo code KFDG.

Go to http://liquidiv.com and use code KFGD at checkout to get 25% off!

Tim and Tam discuss the progress made by Activision Blizzard employees, PlayStation embracing PC, and much more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:40 - Housekeeping
We have a HUGE special day of streaming today LIVE on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
We partnered with NVIDIA GeForce to have Andy continue his play through of  Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy for the first time showing off all of that DLSS and Ray-Tracing goodness and give away some copies of the game right after this show
And THEN after the Guardians stream we are doing a BONUS stream at 2PM PT where Blessing and Barrett are going to play Pumpkin Jack: New-Gen Edition, a Halloween themed PS2-style 3D Platformer by Thunderful Games and we are giving away 60 copies of the game to people in the chat
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:23 - Sony now uses PlayStation PC label for its PC games, Tom Warren, Verge
00:28:09 - BREAKING  NEWS: GTA San Andres coming to Oculus
00:34:05 - Activision Blizzard CEO Bobby Kotick Asks Board To Reduce His Salary And Cut Bonuses Amid Lawsuits -- Eddie Makuch, Gamespo
00:42:52 - What exactly his he trying to prepare for? - Best Friends Q:TheNanoBiologist
00:44:20 -  Ad
00:47:50 - Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg Working On New Music For Grand Theft Auto -- Hayley WIlliams, GameSpot
00:54:36 - An Update From The Prince of Persia: Sands of Time Remake Development Team
00:59:10 - Out today
01:04:04 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Janet

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
